## Description

Parse the results of the analysis of co-expression networks.

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
set.seed(1510)
```

## Parse results

```{r parse_results, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
# Input data
input_dir <- '/home/j.aguirreplans/Projects/Scipher/SampleSize/data/out'

# Define result dataframes
cols_topology = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "size", "rep", "threshold", "num_nodes", "num_edges", "av_degree", "av_path_length", "av_clustering_coef", "num_components", "num_lcc_nodes", "num_lcc_edges", "lcc_z", "lcc_pvalue", "max_k", "num_main_core_nodes", "num_main_core_edges")
topology_df = data.frame(matrix(ncol=length(cols_topology),nrow=0, dimnames=list(NULL, cols_topology)))
cols_ppi = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "size", "rep", "threshold", "num_ppi_nodes", "num_ppi_edges", "fraction_ppi_nodes", "fraction_ppi_edges", "num_ppi_main_core_nodes", "num_ppi_main_core_edges", "fraction_ppi_main_core_nodes", "fraction_ppi_main_core_edges")
ppi_results_df = data.frame(matrix(ncol=length(cols_ppi),nrow=0, dimnames=list(NULL, cols_ppi)))
cols_essential = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "size", "rep", "threshold", "num_essential_genes", "fraction_essential_genes", "num_components", "num_lcc_nodes", "fraction_essential_lcc_nodes", "num_lcc_edges", "lcc_z", "lcc_pvalue")
essential_gene_results_df = data.frame(matrix(ncol=length(cols_essential),nrow=0, dimnames=list(NULL, cols_essential)))
cols_disease = c("method", "dataset", "type_dataset", "size", "rep", 'threshold', 'disease', 'disease_class', 'num_disease_genes', 'fraction_disease_genes', 'num_disease_components', 'num_disease_lcc_nodes', 'fraction_disease_lcc_nodes', 'num_disease_lcc_edges', "disease_lcc_z", "disease_lcc_pvalue")
disease_gene_results_df <- setNames(data.frame(matrix(ncol = length(cols_disease), nrow = 0)), cols_disease)

for(dataset in c('scipher', 'gtex', 'tcga')){
  types_dataset = list.files(paste(input_dir, paste("analysis_", dataset, sep=""), sep="/"))
  for(type_dataset in types_dataset){
    result_files = list.files(paste(input_dir, paste("analysis_", dataset, sep=""), type_dataset, sep="/"))
    for(result_file in result_files){
      input_file = paste(input_dir, paste("analysis_", dataset, sep=""), type_dataset, result_file, sep="/")
      info_file = gsub("_analysis_topology.txt|_analysis_essential_genes.txt|_analysis_disease_genes.txt|_analysis_ppi.txt","",result_file)
      file_split = strsplit(info_file, split="_")[[1]]
      if (("threshold" %in% file_split) | ("edges" %in% file_split)){
        method = file_split[1]
        threshold = as.numeric(file_split[(length(file_split))-2])
        size = file_split[(length(file_split)-6)]
        r = file_split[(length(file_split))-4]
      } else {
        method = file_split[1]
        size = file_split[(length(file_split)-2)]
        r = file_split[(length(file_split))]
      }
      if(r=="samples"){
        size = "all"
        r = NA
      } else {
        size = as.numeric(size)
        r = as.numeric(r)
      }
      individual_df <- fread(input_file)
      if(grepl("analysis_topology", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
        topology_df <- rbind(topology_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
      } else if(grepl("analysis_ppi", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
        ppi_results_df <- rbind(ppi_results_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
      } else if(grepl("analysis_essential_genes", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
        essential_gene_results_df <- rbind(essential_gene_results_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
      } else if(grepl("analysis_disease_genes", result_file, fixed = TRUE)){
        disease_gene_results_df <- rbind(disease_gene_results_df, cbind(data.frame(method=rep(method, nrow(individual_df)), dataset=rep(dataset, nrow(individual_df)), type_dataset=rep(type_dataset, nrow(individual_df)), size=rep(size, nrow(individual_df)), rep=rep(r, nrow(individual_df))), individual_df))
      }
    }
  }
}
```



```{r output_results, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
# Define output files
output_dir = '/home/j.aguirreplans/Projects/Scipher/SampleSize/data/data_shiny_app'
topology_file = paste(output_dir, 'analysis_topology.csv', sep='/')
ppi_results_file = paste(output_dir, 'analysis_ppi.csv', sep='/')
disease_genes_file = paste(output_dir, 'analysis_disease_genes.csv', sep='/')
essential_genes_file = paste(output_dir, 'analysis_essential_genes.csv', sep='/')

# Write results
topology_df %>% fwrite(topology_file)
ppi_results_df %>% fwrite(ppi_results_file)
essential_gene_results_df %>% fwrite(essential_genes_file)
disease_gene_results_df %>% fwrite(disease_genes_file)
```


```{r output_dataset, echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
# Write the clean dataset of number of significant edges to analyze
# Filter by results of the Scipher dataset obtained by Pearson correlation and threshold 0.05
edges_pearson_df = topology_df %>% filter(((method == "pearson") & (type_correlation == "all") & (threshold == 0.05)))
edges_pearson_df$dataset = paste(edges_pearson_df$dataset, edges_pearson_df$type_dataset, sep=":")
edges_pearson_df = edges_pearson_df %>% select(dataset, size, rep, num_edges) %>% arrange(dataset, size, rep)
head(edges_pearson_df)

# Write results
output_dir = '/home/j.aguirreplans/Projects/Scipher/SampleSize/data/out/tables'
edges_file = paste(output_dir, 'pearson_pval_0.05_num_edges_vs_num_samples.txt', sep='/')
edges_pearson_df %>% fwrite(edges_file)
```
